text: Uye nezuva rekumutswa, vachavanyadzisa uye vachati: “Varipi vamwe vangu avo pamusoro pavo maipikisana nekukakavadzana (nevatendi musingateereri Allah)?” Avo vakapihwa ruzivo (rwemutongo waAllah kune vasingatendi) vachati: “Zvirokwazvo, kudzikisirwa nemarwadzo zvichave kune vasingatendi zuva iri.”
